note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Infectious and parasitic diseases death rate
subtitle: The reported annual death rate from [infectious](#dod:communicable-diseases) and [parasitic diseases](#dod:parasitic-infection) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.

display.name: Age-standardized deaths that are from infectious and parasitic diseases per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged all ages
